title: Google Drive Apps require dowloading of PDF instead of printing
content:
When I do the keybind (Control + P) or press the print icon in google apps (google docs, drawings, etc) it automatically downloads a pdf instead of opening the print menu. Chosen solution

Printing on any other site pops up with the printing options. Only on google apps does this happen, including gmail.

This problem is non-existent on Google Chrome and Edge. It does persist on Brave although. Haven't tested any other browsers.
creator: monkeydoggtd

title: ebay won't open or operate correctly (continually asks for password when remain logged in is checked), but is fine on Opera
content: As stated in title. I have ebay as one of my main page widget-thingys but have also tried typing in the address to the main search bar - it simply will not open, but will in Opera browser just fine. I also changed the address for the box to what it comes up as in Opera, but still won't work.
creator: swager

title: Internet Speed Much Slower with Firefox than Chrome or Edge
content: When I run an internet speed test (speedtest.com or any other), I get slower speeds with Firefox compared to Chrome and Edge. My internet speed for download should be 500 mbps. This is what I get with Chrome and Edge, but with Firefox I get 300 to 400 mbps. I tried running Firefox in troubleshooting mode and got the same result. Also tried changing the network settings (proxy or no proxy; Enable DNS on and off, etc), but no luck. Please help.
creator: jayholt5

title: Firefox stops responding when I try to upload a single photo from Explorer to Ancestry's gallery
content: After the most recent FF update, I cannot upload photos from File Explorer to Ancestry.com gallery. I open a photo file to begin the upload process to Ancestry but my monitor goes grey, I cannot use the cursor or click on anything. A big blue circle goes around slowly so my only way out is Esc and it says Firefox is not responding and asks if I want to close the program which I do. I have retried uploading several times and each time it fails. I did a disk cleanup, a system clean up, cleared history, cache and cookies, troubleshooters; all of things+ that are recommended to fix the problem. Command prompt isn't something I use but if I have to, I will. I need get a fix for the not responding issue, otherwise I have to put my family tree on hold indefinitely. Thanks.
creator: lewyes

title: Having a webpage open on Wi-Fi causes consistent ping spikes.
content:
I've noticed that while on Wi-Fi, having Firefox open on any webpage will cause consistent ping spikes every 5 seconds, making online games unplayable.

I've tested this normally, tried disabling all extensions, and tried troubleshoot mode. Task manager does not show any changes with CPU/Memory/Disk/Network under Firefox's process when these ping spikes happen, but the issue goes away immediately every time after closing out Firefox.

The webpage and what you are doing on that webpage does not matter (like streaming YouTube), it even happens after visiting google.com. However, I'll rarely get lucky and this issue won't occur while Firefox is open.

Issue does not occur with other browsers. If there is any additional info that I should provide please let me know.
creator: y

title: Yahoo mail not working in Mozilla Firefox on Microsoft Surface
content: I normally use Yahoo mail with Firefox on my Surface. However, a couple of days ago Yahoo stopped working this way: I can open emails, but I can't delete emails, send an email, open settings, etc. Yahoo mail works on my Android phone. It works on my Surface with Chrome. And it works with Firefox on my PC. Apparently there is a bad relationship between Yahoo mail and Firefox on my Surface. Can anyone suggest a diagnosis and a fix? Thanks
creator: hostba

title: I got a second outlook e-mail acct for my uncle yet there is no inbox is in his list of folders on my pc like on-line and he can't receive email either place What must I do?
content: I setup an email account in outlook for my Uncle. It shows up at outlook's on-line site and in my mail folders. However, in my outlook mail it has no inbox folder listed for him. Most importantly, I don't know how to get his outlook account to include an inbox folder under his outlook acct. name in his outlook folders list and he can't receive e-mail. Please help. Thought it would be easy even for an elderly person wanting to be able to receive e-mail but it has proven to be complicated to setup even for me. Any guidance will certainly be appreciated. When he tries to open any of his outlook folders it takes him to a list of my Firefox accts.???
creator: drkessinger

title: Why can't I change my primary email?
content:
Why can't I change my primary email address on my account? That email is not secure. I need to change it. Right now my options are to delete my firefox account entirely, or keep it connected and let myself continue to be hacked now that my email has been compromised.

Where do I go to change it? It's not under settings like the help articles say. There is no option to change it.
creator: mskity333
